scripts.say: Special Task Force One has arrived at the objective. Rendezvous complete.
Victorious of the Royal Navy has arrived!
Thou have cometh from far away. Dost thou still remember the Northern Sea?
I may have always been fighting on the other side of the world, but... how could I possibly forget my birthplace and its nostalgic sea breeze?
Oh, right, I've brought some fighter planes with me from the Eagle Union!
Is that so?
Have a look! This little darling is known as a "Corsair"! It has specs comparable to our Seafires! And you wouldn't believe how many bombs it can carry!
The Eagle Union's fighters are just so marvelous! And look at this, this is a Wildcat! It can...
Ahem... Returning to the topic at hand, what of the target?
Ah, you'll have to excuse me. I can't help myself when I get excited...
Ahem! My recon planes have already spotted the target. She hasn't moved an inch. Perhaps she can't even move at all?
The lone wolf of the north... Though struck by X-boats, she managed to survive. Truly, a defence most formidable.
In any case, this is an opportunity for the Royal Navy to solve the threat in the Northern Sea once and for all.
Indeed. As soon as this fog has cleared up, I'll send out my little darlings to attack!
...How reliable. Well then, all ships participating in this operation, standby! "Operation Tungsten" shall begin in one hour's time as planned!
Our prey is Tirpitz! What meaningless resistance will she be able to mount? Fleet-
What?! An attack from a new enemy? Report the damages, hurry!
Is the ocean... falling apart...?!
N-no, it's something else... The ocean itself is being sucked up into the sky!
Ahahaha~! What an interesting choice to create a singularity here!
Accursed Sirens, is this thy witchcraft?
Huh? How exactly am I supposed to create a singularity of this size?
We have an emergency situation. Adjusting strategic operations. Prepare all forces for combat!
Target the Siren! Fire at will!
Hey! Didn't your momma teach you about listening to what people have to say? ...Fine, have it your way. Let's have some fun!
